text: José Pinto de Carvalho Santos Águas (; 9 November 1930 – 10 December 2000) was a Portuguese footballer and manager. As a player, he played as a striker. His son, Rui Águas , was also a footballer. His daughter, Helena Maria (more commonly known as Lena d'Água) is a singer. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club Season League National Cup Continental Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Benfica 1950–51 Primeira Divisão 19 23 7 6 – 26 29 1951–52 22 28 7 6 – 29 34 1952–53 25 25 7 10 – 32 35 1953–54 18 24 2 0 – 20 24 1954–55 26 20 6 6 – 32 26 1955–56 26 28 2 2 – 28 30 1956–57 25 30 7 3 – 32 33 1957–58 22 22 8 9 2 0 32 31 1958–59 24 26 8 3 – 32 29 1959–60 25 18 9 12 – 34 30 1960–61 23 27 1 5 9 11 33 43 1961–62 22 18 5 2 9 6 36 26 1962–63 4 2 6 5 3 1 13 8 Total 281 291 75 70 21 18 377 379 Austria Wien 1963–64 Austrian Staatsliga 7 2 0 0 1 0 8 2 Career total 288 293 75 70 22 18 385 381 ===International goals=== #
